# Get Bananas

> Hand-drawn shopping list app for families

For comprehensive documentation, see: [llms-full.txt](https://941getbananas.com/llms-full.txt)

## Overview

Get Bananas is a beautiful, privacy-first shopping list app with a cozy hand-drawn design. Share lists with family and sync instantly across all your Apple devices.

## Key Features

- iCloud Sync: iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple Watch
- Hand-Drawn Design: Personal, cozy aesthetic
- Apple Watch Support: Check items off from your wrist
- Claude Desktop Integration: Hands-free list management (macOS)
- 30+ Languages supported
- Privacy-First: Zero tracking, data in your iCloud

## How It Works

1. Create lists with automatic sections
2. Share with family members
3. Sync instantly across devices
4. Check off items while shopping

## Platforms

- iOS (iPhone, iPad)
- macOS
- watchOS (Apple Watch)

## Pricing

Free to use

## Contact

- Website: https://941getbananas.com
- Developer: 941 Apps
- Email: blake@941apps.com
